trousers.name: Essentials Fleece 3-Stripes Tapered Cuff Pants
trousers.description: Fleecy-soft pants made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials. Whether it's a chilly day or you just want extra comfort, these adidas pants are your pick. Made from a soft cotton blend in fluffy fleece, they welcome all-day wear without a second thought. The fit is finished with an elastic waist, and the legs taper to elastic cuffs that let you show off your shoes. Front pockets make room for practicality, while a phone pocket stashes your favourite must-have. Colour: Wonder Blue.

trousers.name: Logo Men's Regular Fit Knitted Sweat Pants
trousers.description: These stylish, slim-leg sweats combine a contemporary cuffed ankle and cosy elasticated waist rounded off by understated PUMA branding at the leg. Made with at least 20% recycled materials. Regular fit, side pockets for convenient storage of belongings. Ribbed cuffs and an elastic waistband with internal drawcord for customised comfort. Colour: Medium Gray Heather-Cat.

trousers.name: Active Tricot Men's Slim Fit Sweat Pants
trousers.description: High-performance apparel for the ambitious athlete: these stylish bottoms use moisture-wicking power of dryCELL to help you reach your peak. Made with at least 20% recycled materials. Colour: Peacoat.

trousers.name: Zippered Men's Jersey Pants
trousers.description: Less is more. These Zippered Men's Jersey Pants are a contemporary spin on the classic sportswear piece that is equal parts fashion and function, featuring a cut line with articulation for improved freedom of movement. Colour: Dark Gray Heather.

trousers.name: Cricket Teams Men's Training Pants
trousers.description: Get ready to dominate the pitch with the PUMA Cricket Teams Training Pants. These cricket pants feature slip pockets and contrast piping for a sleek and practical design, while the iconic cat logo adds a touch of PUMA's signature style. Colour: PUMA Black-High Risk Red.

trousers.name: Classics Cuffed Slim Fit Men's Sweat Pants
trousers.description: Comfy meets cool in these laid-back sweatpants from the Classics collection, designed with a stylish slim leg and cuffed ankles. Colour: Medium Gray Heather.

trousers.name: AEROREADY Essentials Stanford Open Hem Embroidered Small Logo Pants
trousers.description: Moisture-absorbing pants made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials. Colour: Legend Ink.

trousers.name: Cut pile Pants
trousers.description: Comfortable cloth styled trouser, average height, broad at ends. Equipped with moisture-absorbing fibers to stop irritation. Colour: Bronze Strata.

trousers.name: FUTURE ICONS 3 STRIPES PANTS
trousers.description: Everyday, casual pants made in part with recycled materials. Colour: Trace Khaki.

trousers.name: FitMonkey Sports Regular Track Pant for Men
trousers.description: Elevate your workout with FITMonkey's men's sports trackpants. Crafted from high-quality polyester, our trackpants offer comfort and flexibility for gym sessions or running. Colour: Black.

trousers.name: HRX by Hrithik Roshan Men Rapid Dry Training Shorts
trousers.description: Black solid mid-rise training shorts, has 2 pockets, and drawstring closure engineered with rapid-dry technology

trousers.name: NETCLICK(r) Men's Wear Regular Fit Running Trackpants
trousers.description: Perfect fit for gym, workout, running, jogging, bodybuilding, and other outdoor activities. Fabric: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex. Colour: Grey.

trousers.name: Boldfit Track Pant for Men Slim Fit Joggers
trousers.description: Crafted from a premium blend of soft and moisture-wicking polyester. Colour: Black.

trousers.name: AEROREADY Essentials Stanford Tapered Cuff Embroidered Small Logo Pants
trousers.description: Moisture-absorbing pants made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials. Colour: Black.

trousers.name: Adicolor Classics Firebird Track Pants
trousers.description: Pants made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials. Colour: Collegiate Green.

trousers.name: Camo Men's Sweat Pants
trousers.description: A contemporary spin on the classic sportswear piece featuring dryCELL technology. Colour: Cotton Black.

trousers.name: Men's Logo Pants
trousers.description: Regular fit open hem pants with slip pockets and elastic waistband for ease of movement. Colour: PUMA Navy-Peacoat.

trousers.name: Classics Jacquard Men's Pants
trousers.description: Slim fit knit pants with slip pockets and elasticated waist. Colour: PUMA Black.

trousers.name: Porsche Legacy Men's Motorsport Sweat Pants
trousers.description: Combining classic Porsche yellow with engine-inspired graphics, made with at least 20% recycled material. Colour: PUMA Black.

trousers.name: teamLIGA Training Men's Football Pants
trousers.description: Comfortable and engineered to keep you dry with PUMA's dryCELL moisture-wicking technology. Colour: PUMA Navy-Puma White.
